info.author: Mikel Larreategi
info.description:
cs.autotranslate
=================

Do you go mad when creating images and files in Plone that
you want to use through the different languages' sites?

In previous versions of Plone did you create a 'neutral'
folder and store there your images?

Forget everything!!!

Just create a folder, apply AutoTranslatable interface using
Sub-Typer menu, and tadaaaaaa! All items created inside that
folder will be translated automatically to all available
languages.

Only available for Archetypes based content.




Changelog
=========

1.1 (2014-10-22)
--------------------

- Docs and dependencies
  [erral]

1.0 (2010/12/17)
-------------------

- Initial release
  [erral]
info.name: cs.autotranslate
info.summary: Auto translate items in a folder which is specially marked
info.html_description:
cs.autotranslate

Do you go mad when creating images and files in Plone that you want to use through the different languages’ sites?

In previous versions of Plone did you create a ‘neutral’ folder and store there your images?

Forget everything!!!

Just create a folder, apply AutoTranslatable interface using Sub-Typer menu, and tadaaaaaa! All items created inside that folder will be translated automatically to all available languages.

Only available for Archetypes based content.
